title: RCA Refrigerator Fresh Food Door Gasket - White
description: RCA Refrigerator Fresh Food Door Gasket - White ★★★★★ ★★★★★ 2 Reviews PartSelect Number PS2359946 Manufacturer Part Number WR24X10231 This fresh food door gasket is used to seal the refrigerator door when closed to keep the cool air inside and the room air out.

installationInstructions.author: Jerry from Whitewright, TX
installationInstructions.title: Door gasket was torn at bottom from food residue
installationInstructions.content: When I did the repair,fortunate for me, a nice repairman was fixing my dishwasher. He said to put the new gasket in the dryer,  while I removed the old one, to make it pliable and aid in sealing. I pulled the old gasket out of the retainer clip, cleaned around the area and snapped the new gasket into place(push the  raised part into the groove). The repairman said that food residue, especially at the bottom, caused a sticky glue-like film to form. He also advised to put smear vaseline on the new gasket and wipe it off to leave a film. This would aid in sealing and keeping new the gasket from sticking.
